A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I came into this movie hoping for the best but prepared for the worst based on the many negative fan reviews. Gotta day I really enjoyed it. I’m a pretty cynical guy\, and at 58 I’ve seen it all sci-fi wise. Followed this franchise since I was in high school in 1977. Great action scenes\, above average cgi\, and some damn solid acting.
